Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory949.jpg'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiHuijinNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: 'DialogEnable'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Human Soldier A', 3: 'Argh—', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiDuihualiziLoopWhite.prefab', 2: '2'}
{3: 'A red gleam races toward him in his field of vision. The soldier feels his body violently thrown backward before it hits the wall with a thud and helplessly slides down to the ground.'}
{3: "He strains to make out his attacker's identity through the thick gun smoke."}
{1: '1', 2: '????', 3: 'Hah. Futile resistance.'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiDuihualiziLoopWhite.prefab'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Human Soldier A', 3: "That mask... ****! So it's you, Spikehead!", 4: '1'}
{3: "She remains quiet, slowly raising her spear and pointing it at the soldier's head. He immediately falls silent."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Veronica', 3: "You're like locusts during harvest, swarming and buzzing with your insufferable noise.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Veronica', 3: "Unless I destroy your hope at its very source, you'll keep pushing my limits, time and time again.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiHuijinNew.prefab'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory946.jpg', 2: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 2: '2', 3: '2', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Veronica', 3: 'Speak.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Aleksei', 3: 'The imprisoned humans have escaped, including the commandant from Babylonia and Dimitri.', 4: '2'}
{3: 'The female mechanoid does not answer immediately, instead raising her eyes to survey her surroundings.'}
{3: 'The once-standing buildings have all crumbled to ruins in the riot, while her rage continues to intensify.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Veronica', 3: 'Did they escape, or did you let them go?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Veronica', 3: "They were being held in the spacecraft docking area. Even with some combat capability, that Construct wouldn't be able to breach the gates there.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Veronica', 3: "Not to mention that the Administrative Hall's security codes are nearly impossible to crack... You're telling me that they escaped just like that?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Aleksei', 3: "Cough. Please don't be angry, Veronica.", 4: '2'}
{3: "On the other end of the line, Aleksei speaks with an unfamiliar emotion that Veronica doesn't recognize, his tone completely indifferent."}
{2: 'Veronica', 3: 'You have one minute to explain yourself.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Aleksei', 3: "Sigh. I didn't want this either, but your associate—Hanying—rescued them. The autonomous mechanoids and I tried our best to stop her.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Aleksei', 3: 'But... Hanying is completely devoted to the humans. She single-handedly took down both me and the autonomous mechanoids.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Aleksei', 3: "A mechanoid of such power... I'm no match for her.", 4: '2'}
{3: 'He shakes his head with an exaggerated display of sorrow.'}
{2: 'Veronica', 3: 'Hanying...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Veronica', 3: "...Hah, how absurd. So she's made a deal with that commandant and sided with the humans now?", 4: '1'}
{3: 'She sneers.'}
{2: 'Aleksei', 3: "Veronica, I'm different from her... You know I'm on your side.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Aleksei', 3: "That's why I must warn you, Veronica, as your loyal friend.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Aleksei', 3: "Bifrost is entering its final charging phase. We can't afford any mistakes now.", 4: '2'}
{3: 'He turns to show the screen behind him through the comms feed. The lengthy loading process is nearly complete.'}
{2: 'Veronica', 3: "I don't need you to remind me of that.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Aleksei', 3: 'To build our new world, we must eliminate any possibility of human interference.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Aleksei', 3: 'You know how humans are—always selfish, always arrogant, forever dreaming of eradicating those different from them and ruling this world.', 4: '2'}
{3: 'He waves his arms about in an exaggerated, theatrical manner.'}
{2: 'Aleksei', 3: "Once Babylonia discovers this place, they'll fire up their orbital cannons, their Longinus Arsenal, and then—BOOM!", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Veronica', 3: 'That day will never come.', 4: '1'}
{3: "A piercing gleam flashes in the red mechanoid's eyes, growing colder by the second."}
{2: 'Aleksei', 3: "Babylonia is humanity's last hope, just as you said, and now it's finally time to snuff it out completely.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Aleksei', 3: "Alright... I've made it to the control room, Veronica.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Aleksei', 3: "It's time to begin the final phase.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Aleksei', 3: "Cough... You should get here soon. We don't have much time—that human commandant and Hanying are our biggest wild cards.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Veronica', 3: "...Aleksei, you've been acting strange lately.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Aleksei', 3: 'Ah... Must be your imagination?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 4: '2'}
{3: 'Veronica ends the call without a word. The whooshing sound of rushing wind in the final moments tells Aleksei that she is already on the move.'}
{3: 'The final charging phase... is about to begin.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory946.jpg'}
{2: 'Aleksei', 3: 'Babylonia...', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Lowering his gaze, he figures this somewhat serviceable vessel might last a few days longer than the previous one.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Aleksei', 3: 'Once Bifrost is activated, will Babylonia still be able to turn a blind eye to all of this?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Aleksei', 3: 'Two of our kin... Ha, no, three of them lost. Can the Church of Machina really keep ignoring this?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Aleksei', 3: 'Ah... This is perfect.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Aleksei', 3: 'That future... The one we should have realized, the world we mechanoids should have built...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Aleksei', 3: "If you're not willing to do it... then I'll forge that future myself.", 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory944.jpg'}
{3: 'Upon hearing about the recent communication with Babylonia from you, Hanying furrows her brows.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Hanying', 3: "Hmm... So they've activated Bifrost. But still, we must stop Veronica.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: "According to the resistance, if we can't cut off the reactor's power supply... it'll be nearly impossible to stop Bifrost.", 4: '1'}
{2: "No, the reactor shouldn't be our only option.", 3: '105'}
{2: "Despite the high energy readings, Bifrost still hasn't really activated.", 3: '106'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Hanying', 3: 'What do you mean, Commandant?', 4: '1'}
{2: "It's as if it's waiting for some kind of command...", 3: '110'}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: "In other words, there's likely a mechanism that can directly shut down Bifrost.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'There might be a trap ahead. You should not put all your eggs in one basket.'}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: 'Let me go. If I encounter Veronica, I might stand a chance against her.', 4: '1'}
{3: "After strategizing with you briefly, Hanying volunteers to stop Veronica while you and Liv take another route to find Bifrost's potential control room to halt its activation directly."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Hanying', 3: "Well then, let's go.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: 'I will.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: "Take care of yourselves too. When this is all over, let's meet at the top of Bifrost.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'After bidding farewell to you and Liv, Hanying sets out alone on her journey.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory947.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Hanying', 3: 'Bifrost is just up ahead. That guard who was impersonating Lee ran off in this direction too.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Autonomous mechanoid guards patrol the entrance, keeping a vigilant watch on their surroundings.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Hanying', 3: '...An express elevator straight to Bifrost? No wonder there are so many mechanoids guarding it. They must consider this place crucial.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: "These autonomous mechanoids are following Veronica's orders. Looks like a fight is inevitable.", 4: '1'}
